notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Bilong yu kandet bai kamap anonim insait long 7 de bilong
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Olgeta kandet bilong yu insait long dispela komiuniti bai kamap anonim na bai stap long archive insait long 7 de, bihain long dispela yu no inap long rausim o senisim. Lukim kandet bilong yu daunbilo.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Olgeta kandet bilong yu insait long dispela grup bai kamap anonim na bai stap long archive insait long 7 de, bihain long dispela yu no inap long rausim o senisim. Lukim kandet bilong yu daunbilo.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Klikim link bilong komiuniti daunbilo, login olsem admin na pilim Fraud management long menu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Namba bilong ol posibol fraudulent activities wantaim estimet 75% sans bilong fraud
email.possibleFraudInformation: Sistem otomatik bilong mipela i bin painim posibol fraudulent activity. Yu ken lukluk klostu tru long Community admin interface. Sampela long dispela aktiviti inap gat non fraudulent as tasol so yu mas lukluk gut bipo yu rausim kandet.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Dispela kandet i bin otomatikali makim olsem toxic iusim AI algorithms we i estimetim toxicity bilong kandet. Yu ken rausim kandet sapos yu nidim.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Wanpela AI algorithm otomatikali i bin makim visual imagery i konektim wantaim dispela kandet. Dispela algorithm i lukluk long ol piksa bilong painim posibol adult, violent, medical, na racy imagery. Yu ken rausim kandet sapos yu nidim.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: AI algorithm i goheti hela gaba score, long dispela taim yu no ken wari, yu no ken mekim wanpela samting moa na yu ken lusim dispela email.
email.automaticToxicityHowLikely: Hau planti (%) long i kamap poison
email.automaticToxicityEnglishText: Inglis text i yusim long score
email.newPointedAddedToThisIdea: Wanpela nupela point i bin kamap long dispela tingting
email.newPointedAddedToIdea: Wanpela nupela point i bin kamap long tingting bilong yu

email.hasBeenMarkedDown: i bin makim olsem i no helpim

email.pointReport: Point i ripot long brukim tok orait

email.user_invite_2: Klikim link or pestim go insait long browser adres bar long akseptim singaut

email.reset_password_2: Sapos yu no askim long dispela, plis lusim em i go.
email.reset_password_3: Paswod bilong yu bai no senis inap yu opim link antap na wokim nupela wan.
